interfaces

Interface DoorInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Door

    public interface DoorInterface
extends Entity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flipDoor()
      Using the same door object for the two room objects it connects, so have to flip door to place in correct position inside the room being moved into.
      int getDoorNum() 
      int getDoorPosition() 
      Room getRoom1() 
      Room getRoom2() 
      Entity getUnlockItem()
      Return the unlock item for this door
      boolean isLocked()

      This is used to set initial position for all rooms.
      void setRoom1(Room room)
      Set the first room this door connects to
      void setRoom2(Room room)
      Set the second room this door connects to
      void unlockDoor(Entity item)
      Unlock door if player has correct item

      • Methods inherited from interface interfaces.Entity

        getBoundingBox, getHeight, getImage, getType, getWidth, getX, getY, setImage

    • Method Detail

      • setDoorPosition

        void setDoorPosition(int newPos)
        This is used to set initial position for all rooms. When being used in initialise() in Level.class, used to flip position of door from what was added to corresponding room. This way the doors line up on the map.
        Parameters:
        newPos - The new wall to put this door on

      • unlockDoor

        void unlockDoor(Entity item)
        Unlock door if player has correct item
        Parameters:
        item -

        void flipDoor()
